cookiesBar.usingCookies: Rolex websites use cookies. Find out what cookies are
cookiesBar.agreeConfirmation: . By continuing your visit to this site, you agree to our use of cookies.

cookies.title: Cookie policy
cookies.firstParagraph: We use cookies to provide you with a safe, effective and user-friendly website.
cookies.secondParagraph: We use performance & tracking cookies to further improve our website in order to always provide you with the best possible online experience tailored to your needs.
cookies.thirdParagraph: Technical cookies are strictly necessary for www.myrolexnetwork.com to work properly. We use them to provide you access to premium services using your Rolex profile. Technical cookies cannot be deactivated.

legal.title: Legal information
legal.firstParagraph: Use of the Communication Guidelines MYROLEXNETWORK (the “Portal”) is generally limited to affiliated ROLEX SA companies and ROLEX’s authorized distributors that wish to incorporate, use or order any content of the Portal (the “Content”). However, ROLEX SA reserves the right to grant access to other parties as it determines to be appropriate. Each user agrees to provide ROLEX SA with accurate and complete registration information. Users should provide updated registration information to ROLEX SA. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their password and account and each user is fully responsible for all activities that occur under such users’s password and account. If any unauthorized use of your password or account or other breach of security occurs you must notify ROLEX SA immediately and promptly change your password.
legal.secondParagraph:
All intellectual property rights, in particular copyrights, in the Portal and the Content are owned by ROLEX SA.
User shall not remove any copyright or other intellectual property notices contained in the Content.
The trademarks, logos and any other distinctive character displayed on the Portal and the Content are owned by ROLEX SA.
legal.thirdParagraph: You shall not use any device, software or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper workings of the Portal. You shall not take any action which imposes an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on ROLEX SA's infrastructure. You agree that you will not use any robot, spider, other automatic device, or manual process to monitor, deep link with or copy ROLEX SA's Web pages or the content contained therein without ROLEX SA's prior written consent.
legal.fourthParagraph: ROLEX SA provides the portal, the content and its services “as is” and without any warranty, express or implied, to the full extent permitted by applicable law. ROLEX SA specifically disclaims the implied warranties, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. ROLEX SA does not warrant that the portal will operate uninterrupted, error free or that the portal, its server and any content are free of computer viruses and other harmful elements. ROLEX SA makes no warranty regarding the accuracy, timeliness or completeness of any content or other information on the portal, nor that the content or the portal will meet your requirements.
legal.fifthParagraph: In no event shall ROLEX SA, its content providers, other suppliers, licensors be liable for any damages whatsoever (including, without limitation, direct, indirect, incidental and consequential damages, lost profits, or damages resulting from lost data or business interruption) resulting from the use or inability to use portal and the content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort, or any other legal theory. ROLEX SA shall not have any liability whatsoever arising from your use of or reliance on any content, on any information regarding the content or on the portal generally.
legal.sixthParagraph: ROLEX SA reserves the right to immediately terminate your account in its discretion, including in the event ROLEX SA determines that your conduct is unacceptable, or in the event you breach these Terms and Conditions.
legal.seventhParagraph:
ROLEX SA respects your rights to privacy and is committed to maintaining your confidentiality. Any information you provide ROLEX SA through this Portal will not be sold or rented. ROLEX SA does not collect any information from you without your knowledge and permission. In order to access the Portal and the Content, you must enter some identifying information. ROLEX SA does not disclose this information to anyone except to manage the Portal and database with the help of service providers who are subject to non-disclosure obligations. Information you provide ROLEX SA is stored in a secure location and is accessible only by designated staff.
ROLEX SA uses cookies to record the preferences of users. Cookies are small files which are stored on your hard drive that ease navigation, and increase the user-friendliness of a Portal.
legal.eighthParagraph:
These Terms and Conditions and, generally, the use of the Portal and the Content, are governed by the laws of Switzerland.
Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms and Conditions and, generally, with the use of the Portal and the Content, shall be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the ordinary courts of the canton of Geneva, Switzerland.
legal.ninthParagraph: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us by writing to or calling:
